subject: Highndry Recovery Mission - Official Briefing
body:
Dear Traveller,

As discussed in our meeting, here is the official briefing for your detached duty assignment.

=== THE SHIP ===
Highndry is a Type S Scout/Courier, standard configuration. She is currently stranded somewhere on Walston. The previous crew disabled her control electronics before abandoning ship. We don't have precise coordinates - you'll need to investigate when you arrive.

=== YOUR STATUS ===
This is a one-year renewable lease under detached duty terms. The Scout Service retains ownership; you operate under our terms. Renewal is based on performance and compliance.

=== EQUIPMENT ===
Your repair kit includes:
- Three flight cases of circuit panels and tools
- Portable diagnostic unit with temporary control software
- Container of general spares

The diagnostic unit can upload a software patch good for three months.

=== TRAVEL ===
Passage booked on the Autumn Gold, departing tomorrow.
- Jump to 567-908 (Scout waystation) - ~1 week
- Layover for cargo/refueling - 1 day
- Jump to Walston - ~1 week

=== EXPENSES ===
Cr1000 per traveller credited for incidentals. Life support and fuel costs during mission are covered. Additional Cr1000 available after Highndry passes post-recovery checkout.

Good luck with your recovery.

Anders Casarii
Scout Service Administrator
Flammarion Highport
